DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective chart review of patients who received N-acetylcysteine for APAP toxicity to assess length of oral vs IV treatment and overall healthcare costs.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Acetaminophen Toxicity With N-acetylcysteine
